trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection"></xref> defines the allowable child content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Span"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock"></xref> elements.

<xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection> creation is only permitted inside an element that owns an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> or a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>.
As such, an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection> cannot be instantiated directly and has no default or overloaded constructor.
Adds an implicit <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Run"></xref> element with the given text, supplied as a <xref href="System.String"></xref>.
Text set as the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Run.Text"></xref> property for the implicit <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Run"></xref>.
Adds an implicit <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref> with the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> already in it.

<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> set as the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer.Child"></xref> property for the implicit <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref>.
Gets the first <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> element within this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection"></xref>.
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> element within this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection"></xref>.
Gets the last <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> element within this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection"></xref>.
The last <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Inline"></xref> element within this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection"></xref>.
